task: Add a watermark to one page
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the page where you want to add the watermark.
Click on the 'Design' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Page Background' section, click on the 'Watermark' button.
Select the desired watermark from the available options or click on 'Custom Watermark' to create a custom one.
Adjust the watermark settings as needed, such as the font, size, color, and transparency.
Preview the watermark to ensure it appears as desired.
Click on the 'Apply' button to add the watermark to the current page.
Save the document to preserve the changes.
